sen.j: 当子内親王が斎宮に卜定されて伊勢下向の儀式「別れの御櫛」に臨んだ際、天皇も斎宮も互いに振り返ってはならない決まりであったのを、父三条天皇は別れがたさに思わず振り返らせてしまったという（『大鏡』）。
sen.e: At the ceremony of "Wakare no Migushi" which was held when Imperial Princess Toshi, who had been appointed to Saigu by divination, was about to depart for Ise Province, her father, the Emperor Sanjo, looked back at her in spite of himself because of the pain of parting, though neither the Emperor nor she was allowed to do so ("Okagami"(a history book)).

sen.j: それほど鍾愛の皇女であったが、伊勢から帰京した長和5年（1016年）、当子内親王に藤原道雅が密通しているという噂が立った。
sen.e: Though she was loved by the Emperor as deeply as mentioned above, the rumor that FUJIWARA no Michimasa committed adultery with Imperial Princess Toshi was spread in 1016 when she was back from Ise to Kyoto.

sen.e: The Emperor Sanjo, who was infuriated at the above rumor, censured Michimasa and purged Menoto no Chujo Naishi (a court noble lady) who mediated them in spite of the efforts of the Empress consort and imperial princes to calm down him.
